caption.title: More damage and weaker resistance in invasive plant after herbivory.
caption.p: Differences of leaf biomass (a), total biomass (b), P max (c), Fv/Fm (d), leaf nitrogen concentration (e), leaf lignin concentration (f), leaf cellulose concentration (g) and leaf polyphenolic concentration (h) (mean Â±SD) between A. sessilis (black bars) and A. philoxeroides (grey bars) at three herbivore load levels.
